title: Bug 10654: Allow all jars in a folder to be added to build path
description: Bug 10654: Allow all jars in a folder to be added to build path
OB: The current behavior does not allow all jar files in a folder to be added to the build path.
EB: It would be useful if a classpath variable could be used to specify a directory, so that all jar files in that directory are automatically added to the build path.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the build configuration settings.
2. Try to add a folder containing multiple jar files to the build path.
3. Observe that only individual jar files can be added, but not the entire folder at once.
